create_finetune.description: Adds a new fine-tune (question + suggested answer) for the specified chatbot in SiteSpeakAI.

props.name: question
props.description: The question text you want the chatbot to be able to answer.

props.name: suggestedAnswer
props.description: The answer you suggest the chatbot use for that question.

delete_finetune.description: Deletes a fine-tune entry from the selected chatbot.

sendQuery.description: Sends a query to the specified chatbot and retrieves a response.

props.name: prompt
props.description: The question or query text you want the chatbot to answer.

props.name: format
props.description: Format of the returned response; markdown or html.

newLead.description: Triggers when a new lead with an email address is created in SiteSpeakAI.
